Gallery

(702) 887-1656 Schedule Service

Our Work

Project
Gallery

At Code Blue HVAC, we take pride in every installation, repair, and maintenance project we complete. Our gallery showcases the quality of workmanship you can expect when you choose Code Blue HVAC.

From residential AC installations and furnace replacements to commercial rooftop units and ductless mini-split systems, our portfolio demonstrates the range and quality of our work across the Las Vegas Valley.

Want to see more examples or discuss your specific project? Contact us today for a free consultation.

Project Types

Work We
Are Proud Of

Our project gallery includes residential AC system installations and replacements, commercial HVAC installations for offices and retail spaces, ductless mini-split system installations, ductwork replacement and repair projects, and custom HVAC solutions for unique spaces.

Each project represents our commitment to quality materials, professional installation, and customer satisfaction. We approach every job—big or small—with the same level of care and attention to detail.

Start Your Project Call Code Blue

Whether it's a broken AC in the middle of a Las Vegas summer or a heating system that won't start, our licensed technicians are ready to help 24/7. Fast response, honest pricing, guaranteed satisfaction. Seniors, veterans, and first responders get 15% off.
